changelog.change: Fixed issue with the SmallImage color.
Improved %delta mechanics, allowing for custom comparisons.
Added option to display a dash (-) if the delta is blank.
Added options to change the comparison used by the %delta option.
Added game_short option, which displays the shortened game name.
The %time option now has proper formatting.
Moved documentation to Markdown file in the GitHub Repository.
Fixed issue with %time using a null value.
Added options to adjust the formatting of the %delta parameter.
Added the option to change the comparison used in the Rich Presence.
Added the option to remove subsplit syntax from the %splitname parameter.
Changed small parts of error handling with the Discord interface.
Downgraded Discord Game SDK to improve performance.
Rolled back 1.5.5 changes.
Optimized UpdateActivity requests when sent to the Discord Client.
Added the option to include the Timer Offset when calculating elapsed time.
Added UpdateManager Support.
Tabs added to the Settings menu allowing further customization of the different states the timer can be in (Running, Not Running, Paused, Ended).
Added two more custom options, %time and %inherit.
Added the option to clear Discord activity if the timer is not running.
Added %category_detailed as a custom option, allowing you to display the category name along with any variables.
Added %comparison as a custom option, allowing you to display your current comparison.
Cleaned up some of the code.
Fixed issue where if a delta did not exist (i.e comparing against Nothing or brand new splits), the application would freeze. (Thanks SurprisedPika!).
Rebuilt Component from essentially the ground up, should be a lot more stable.
Customization options in the settings menu, such as the ability to toggle the Elapsed time and change all the text.
